title: Building an Inclusive Web3 and Metaverse
description: Web 3.0 and the metaverse turn the consumer into a digital community investor, potentially shifting the balance of power for women and the diverse new majority. What will it take to build inclusion into their inception, drive diversity in their adoption, and retain cultural value in digital communities?
itunes:author: Barron's Live
